scripts.paragraph: node build components layouts && cd 1-paragraph && webpack --mode development

scripts.subscription.colour: node build components layouts && cd 7-subscription.colour && webpack --mode development

scripts.page.static: node build components layouts && cd 9-page.static && webpack --mode development
scripts.alert: node build components layouts && cd 10-alert && webpack --mode development
scripts.pointer: node build components layouts && cd 11-pointer && webpack --mode development
scripts.resize: node build components layouts && cd 12-resize && webpack --mode development
scripts.request.load: node build components layouts && cd 13-request.load && webpack --mode development

scripts.todo: cd todo && node build todo/components todo/layouts && webpack --mode development
